```{r config, echo = FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  fig.path = "figs/"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)

library(evoteams)
data("leaderboards")
```

```{r leaderboards}
ggplot(leaderboards, aes(Entries, Score)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = slug), position = position_jitter(0.1, 0),
             alpha = 0.6) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    axis.ticks = element_blank()
  )
```
